issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Some jsp pages in the UI are missing a DOCTYPE declaration. This causes the pages to render incorrectly on some browsers, such as IE9. Please see parent bug HADOOP-7827 for details and patch.
fields.summary: mapreduce jsp pages missing DOCTYPE [post-split branches]

comments.body: Please see parent bug HADOOP-7827 for patch.

Integrated in Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk-Commit #1391 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-Hdfs-trunk-Commit/1391/])
    HADOOP-7827 HDFS-2588 MAPREDUCE-3464. jsp pages missing DOCTYPE. Contributed by Dave Vronay.
